reviews.review_msg: Professor Doyon did a good job adapting to the online format. The lecture videos were well done. She has very high standards and you will likely be marked a lot harder than you're used to. This aspect of the course was quite frustrating. Having said this, I appreciated the extensive feedback we received on our assignments.

Andres is such an interesting person, in the best way possible. He engages students every time he speaks and has such interesting stories to share. As an instructor, he can be vague in his feedback and criteria, but he might already know this as grading is pretty lenient. I took SD 481 and REM 356W. SD 481 was a pretty fun course.

Andres made Environmental Policy interesting and enjoyable. I struggle with writing and for an upper division W class it was easy to do well. He has some of the best lectures around and is very easy to listen to and learn from.
